Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
To receive an A in FA-100 you will need to complete four online modules.   The modules are located on your BrainHoney.

ONLINE MODULES INSTRUCTIONS

Read and study the four online modules and write a short paper about each of them. 
  • The paper should be typed and 150-250 words long.
  • It should discuss at least three things that you learned from the module, and show good attention to spelling, punctuation, and grammar.
  • You should submit you paper online through BrainHoney by due date.  (There will be one for each of the four online modules) .

As written assignments are graded, the grades will be posted on I-Learn. Grades should be posted within one week of receiving your assignments. Make sure that your I-Learn grade book shows credit for assignments that you have turned in.  Late assignments will not be accepted.

  

DUE DATES

For sections 1 and 2, each module will have a due date. Submit through BrainHoney.

Music Module due:                       Thursday, May 12 at 11:45pm.

Performing Arts Module due:   Thursday, June 2 at 11:45pm.

Dance Module due:                       Thursday, June 23 at 11:45pm.

Visual Arts Module due:             Thursday, July 14 at 11:45pm.

For section 3 (Long Distance) all online modules should be submitted in (along with Gospel Lecture paper) by: Friday, July 15 at 4pm.

If you have any questions, please contact the FA100 office at Collegepva@byui.edu.
